Articles.Content: Hi, I just read the noobie FAQ and I know that my posts go to the moderators for approval. I registered this morning and have not yet gotten my registration Email. Can you please take a look at this? Thank you.

If you got this far you don't need the email, welcome to the forums

Also, moving to Welcome Aboard!

Hello The Space Core, and welcome to the forums!

After three posts (I think it's still three) your posts will not require moderator approval. Good to have you aboard - I hope you enjoy this community.

Happy landings!
